description:
※ Designed Mystery Level : New gameplay - fresh excitement design for you

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Tap, tap, tap! The Candy Monster is coming!

That's a beautiful sweet world! All lovely cookies, cakes, candies and chocolates are waiting for you and the MONSTERS! We have 4 different sweet scenes: Cake tower, Chocolate House, Sky of Cheese, Candy World.

Look, the little playful monsters are hiding in the cakes and candies. You need to catch and tap them when they stretch their heads. Then you'll get one coin and 100-200 points! And please collect the candy and donuts as much as possible. They'll help you to get the goal.

But, be careful the Green greedy monster. They love all the candies and they'll steal your half points. Remember this: Do Not Touch them!

-----------------------
|| Gameplay ||
-----------------------
1. You have 30 seconds to tap monsters and candy.
2. Tap the blue Candy Monster and the red 2-Head Monster to get coins and points as quick as possible.
3. Collect the candy and donuts or make a combo with 2-Head monster. You'll get the bonus stars and more points.
4. Buy props with the coins to improve your game.

---------------------
|| Monsters ||
---------------------
- Candy Monster ： Tap a Candy Monster! Get +100 points and 1 coin
- 2-Head Monster ： Tap a 2-Head Monster。You'll get +200 points and 1 coin. Try to tap 3 2-Head Monster in a row and make a COMBO, you'll get +500 points bonus!
- Greedy Monster：Avoid the greedy Monster. They'll steal half points from you! Or you can buy the shields in the shop to protect yourself.

----------------
|| Tip ||
----------------
1. Use the shield to protect yourself. And you can get the shield in the game or buy them in the shop.
2. Buy the "time" in the shop.
3. Tap the "x2" to double your points.
4. The most important thing is : Do Not Tap the Greedy Monster!
